| HistoryText             = The '''Yellow Druids''' served [[Yamath (Earth-616)|Yamath]], the [[fire-god]].{{r|Creatures on the Loose #27|; In the Crypts of Yamath!}}{{r|Creatures on the Loose #28|; Mountain of Thunder!}}

They came to the city of [[Patanga]], on the continent of [[Lemuria (Pacific Ocean)|Lemuria]]. The archdruid and prophet of Yamath [[Vaspas Ptol (Earth-616)|Vaspas Ptol]] slew the [[sark]], jailing his daughter [[Sumia Chond (Earth-616)|Sumia Chond]], the [[sarkaja]] he intended to marry to ensure his control over the city, and usurped the throne.{{r|Creatures on the Loose #28|; Mountain of Thunder!}}

<!-- Thongor -->...{{r|Creatures on the Loose #27|; In the Crypts of Yamath!}}{{r|Creatures on the Loose #28|; Mountain of Thunder!}}
